1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: A car accident brings two desperate people together- Kang Hye Soo, a widow stuck raising a daughter while trying to pay off her husband's debt and Han Ji Hoon, a restaurateur trying to impress his father while searching for an organ donor for his estranged mother. Will a fake marriage solve their problems? (DramaFever)

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: As Ji Hoon's mother gets worse and causes a scene, uninvited guests and terrible news lead Hye Soo to consider Ji Hoon's offer. (DramaFever)

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Hye Soon agrees to the marriage and they start the arrangements. The situation gets off to a rocky start and only gets worse when Oh Mi Ran demands to meet Hye Soon. (DramaFever)

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Eun Song's utter rejection of Ji Hoon leads to him recall the worst days of his own childhood. (DramaFever)

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Eun Sung starts to warm up to Ji Hoon in time for the hospital interview, but he has his hands full as his ex-girlfriend (and his brother's ex-fiancee) keeps showing up. Hye Soo's visit to her husband's grave leads to a conflict with her mother-in-law. (DramaFever)

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Hye Soo wins over President Han after he discovers her role. The contract is at risk as more people find out about the arrangement. (DramaFever)

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: After Hye Soo collapses and is taken to the hospital, Ji Hoon grows closer to her and En Sung. Han Sung Gook puts the pieces together, and does everything in his power to obstruct the arrangement.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Han Sung Gook allows the surgery to proceed on several conditions, all of which cause serious problems for his family.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: When Oh Mi Ran decides not to go through with the surgery, Hye Soo, Ji Hoon, and Eun Sung go to her childhood home to try to change her mind. (DramaFever)

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: After sharing a kiss and not going through with the surgery, Ji Hoon and Hye Soo have trouble going back to their lives. (DramaFever)

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: After refusing Ji Hoon's proposal, Hye Soo attempts to return to her life, but rumors fly and health problems arise. (DramaFever)

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Ji Hoon tries to win over Hye Soo, but inadvertently learns about her disease and doubles his efforts. Meanwhile, Jung Hoon has a plan to take down his father and Ji Hoon. (DramaFever)

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Hye Soo undergoes her treatment as Ji Hoon tries to court her and a figure from her past tries to get her to sign a whole new contract. (DramaFever)

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: With rumors of the organ trade going around the company, President Han, Ji Hoon, and Jung Hoon all try to get Hye Soo to back them. (DramaFever)

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Ji Hoon gives up everything to spend his life with Hye Soo, but she is troubled by her worsening symptoms. (DramaFever)

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: In the series finale, Hye Soo accepts Ji Hoon's official proposal, but with her continued health issues, can they live happily ever after when their time together could be cut short? (DramaFever)

imdb.plot outline: Ji-Hoon (Lee Seo-Jin) has a cynical personality due to his family background. Even though he comes from a rich family, his mother had an affair with a married man and they had Ji-Hoon. From a young age, he became separated from his mother and began to live with his father's family. One day, he learns that his mother has a liver disease and she doesn't have much time left to live. Her only hope is to get a liver transplant. Ji-Hoon becomes desperate. At that time, he meets Hye-Soo (Uee) and her daughter Eun-Sung (Shin Rin-Ah). Hye-Soo has lived alone with her daughter Eun-Sung after her husband's death. She is constantly hounded by loan sharks due to her late husband's debt. Hye-Soo begins to work at the restaurant run by Ji-Hoon. She learns that she has a brain tumor and she needs money for her daughter after she passes away. Hye-Soo overhears from Ji-Hoon that he is looking for a liver donor for his mother. To make it happen legally, Ji-Hoon plans to marry the donor. Hye-Soo insists to Ji-Hoon that she wants to be the donor. Ji-Hoon, unaware of Hye-Soo's brain tumor, accepts her offer and they prepare a marriage contract. Notes
imdb.title: Marriage Contract

Hye-Soo has lived alone with her daughter Eun-Sung after her husband's death. She is constantly hounded by loan sharks due to her late husband's debt. Hye-Soo begins to work at the restaurant run by Ji-Hoon. She learns that she has a brain tumor and she needs money for her daughter after she passes away.
